faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Quick answers about the platform and the test. Use the left navigation to jump between sections.

general.title: General FAQs
general.desc: Common questions about the test and reports.
general.q1: How long does the test take?
general.a1: Most users finish within 5–10 minutes. Answer honestly in a focused setting.
general.a2: Your report and history are stored in your account and available anytime.
general.a3: Yes, the experience is optimized for both mobile and desktop devices.

integration.title: Integration
integration.desc: Connecting with LMS or enterprise systems.
integration.q1: Do you support LMS gradebook integration?
integration.a1: We can export results and integrate with common LMS platforms. Please contact support for details.
integration.a2: REST APIs are available for read/write operations. An API key is required.
integration.q3: How do I sync users and courses?
integration.a3: Use bulk import or APIs with scheduled jobs for synchronization.

account.title: Account & Security
account.q1: I forgot my password. What should I do?
account.a1: Use the “Forgot Password” option on the sign-in page to reset it.
account.q2: How can I delete my account and data?
account.a2: Submit a deletion request in settings. We process it according to compliance requirements.
account.a3: We use encrypted transport and access controls. See the Privacy Policy for details.

billing.title: Billing & Payments
billing.a1: We support major cards and popular third‑party payment providers.
billing.a2: Refunds are available within the allowed period according to the Terms.
billing.a3: Invoices are supported. Provide your billing information after the order is completed.

about.title: About Us
about.description: Learn about our mission and team.

hero.title: Empowering Self‑Discovery Through Precision
hero.desc: At Renovex we believe in the power of collaboration to achieve outstanding results. With a team of skilled professionals and a commitment to quality, we work hand‑in‑hand with our clients to bring their ideas to life. Together, we create spaces and solutions that stand the test of time.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.desc: Quick answers to common questions to help you understand our platform.
faq.q1: How can I reach your support team?
faq.a1: Use the contact information on this page to email or call us. We respond within 24 hours.
faq.q2: Do courses support live or recorded sessions?
faq.a2: We support both live and recorded formats. Check the course page for the specific delivery method.
faq.a3: If a course hasn't started or doesn't meet expectations, submit a refund request within 7 days per policy.
faq.q4: Do you offer plans for organizations or schools?
faq.a4: Yes. We provide group and custom solutions. Contact us to discuss your needs.
faq.q5: Is there progress and grade tracking?
faq.a5: You can view learning progress and assessment results in your dashboard with detailed reports.

content.desc: At Renovex we are committed to revolutionizing the construction industry with innovative, sustainable, and cost‑effective solutions. With a proven track record of delivering exceptional projects, we combine state‑of‑the‑art technology, skilled expertise, and customer‑centric approaches to bring visions to life.

mission.title: Unveiling the Layers of Your Personality
mission.desc: Our mission is to guide individuals on a journey of self‑understanding and growth. By leveraging the profound insights of our meticulously crafted personality test and report, we aim to illuminate the unique patterns that define each personality type. We believe in the transformative power of self‑knowledge and its ability to enhance personal and professional relationships, promote mental well‑being, and foster a fulfilling life.
mission.list1: Fostering Sustainable Growth and Green Development

vision.title: A Trusted Partner in Your Personal Growth Journey
vision.desc: We strive to be your trusted partner in self‑development, combining thoughtful methodology, modern tools, and human‑centered design to help you grow with clarity and confidence.
vision.list4: Leading the Future of Building Solutions

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.description: We respect your privacy. This page explains how we collect, use, and protect information.

general.title: Overview
general.body: We collect and process data only for lawful, necessary, and explicit purposes, and apply reasonable safeguards to protect your information.

usage.title: How We Use Information
usage.desc: Examples of how your information is used:
usage.a1: Account creation, course access, assessments, and report generation.
usage.a2: Important notices, service updates, and support responses.
usage.a3: Anonymous or aggregated analytics to improve product experience and performance.

sharing.title: Data Sharing & Disclosure
sharing.desc: We do not sell personal information. We may share only when necessary:
sharing.a1: Contracted providers for infrastructure and customer support.
sharing.a2: When required to comply with law, protect users, or prevent fraud.

cookies.title: Cookies & Tracking
cookies.body: We use cookies to remember preferences and perform site analytics. You can manage cookies in your browser—some features may be impacted.

changes.title: Changes to This Policy
changes.body: We may update this policy from time to time. Significant changes will be communicated via in‑app notice or email.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.body: For privacy questions or requests, please reach out using the contact information provided on this page.

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.description: By using the service, you agree to the following terms and conditions.

accept.title: Acceptance of Terms
accept.body: Registering or using the service constitutes acceptance of this agreement.

use.title: Use of Service
use.body: Use the service in accordance with applicable laws and this agreement. Do not abuse or disrupt the platform.

account.title: Accounts & Security
account.body: Keep credentials secure and remain responsible for activities under your account. Notify us immediately of suspicious activity.

payments.title: Payments
payments.body: For paid courses or subscriptions, fees, billing, and refunds follow the policies described on the relevant pages.

content.title: User Content
content.body: You retain ownership of your content while granting us necessary rights to process and display it to provide the service.

prohibited.title: Prohibited Conduct
prohibited.body: Including but not limited to unlawful content, infringement, attacks, or interference with platform operations.

termination.title: Termination
termination.body: We may suspend or terminate service for violations. You may stop using the service and request data export at any time.

disclaimer.title: Disclaimers
disclaimer.body: The service is provided as‑is without warranties of fitness or uninterrupted operation to the fullest extent permitted by law.
